name.firstSourceText: 姓名：武永卫 职称：教授 电话：62796341 邮箱：wuyw@tsinghua.edu.cn 个人主页：http://madsys.cs.tsinghua.edu.cn/~yongweiwu/ 教育背景 理学学士 (计算数学), 兰州大学, 中国, 1996; 理学硕士 (计算数学), 兰州大学, 中国, 1999; 理学博士 (应用数学), 中科院系统所, 中国, 2002. 社会兼职 19th IEEE/ACM CCGrid 2019,29th IEEE/ACM SC 2016, 22nd IEEE/ACM HPDC 2013等国际会议程序委员会主席/委员； IEEE Transactions on Sustainable Computing指导委员会委员（2015–2019）； IEEE Transaction on Cloud Computing 编委（2014 – 2019）； IEEE Cloud Computing编委（2015–2018）； Journal of Grid Computing 编委（2013–今）； Journal of Cluster Computing 编委（2013–今）。 研究领域 并行与分布式处理, 云计算，存储系统 研究概况 开展计算机系统方面的研究工作，专注于并行与分布式系统的设计、实现、评价和应用等。具体的研究方向包括运行时环境、数据存储与管理、虚拟化、资源管理调度、性能分析、分布式协同与一致性、可靠性与容错等。 奖励与荣誉 中组部“万人计划”科技创新领军人才（2019）； 中国电子学会科技进步特等奖：飞天云操作系统核心技术及产业化（2017）； 国家技术发明二等奖：面向社区共享的高可用云存储系统（2015）； 国家科技进步二等奖：中国教育科研网格（2008）； 中创软件人才奖（2011）； Tsinghua Science and Technology 2015：最佳论文奖（2015）； FSE 2014：ACM SIGSOFT杰出论文奖（2014）； IMIS 2011：最佳论文奖（2011）； ScalCom 2009：最佳论文奖（2009）。 学术成果 [1] RF-RPC: Remote Fetching PRC Paradigm for RDMA-Enabled Network Yongwei Wu, Teng Ma, Maomeng Su, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, Zhenyu Guo, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems (TPDS),2018 [2] ReGraph: A Graph Processing Framework that Alternately Shrinks and Rapartitions the Graph Xue Li, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, Yongwei Wu, 32nd ACM International Conference on Supercomputing (ICS 2018) [3] Low Latency RNN Inference with Cellular Batching Pin Gao, Lingfan Yu, Yongwei Wu, Jinyang Li, 13th European Conference on Computer Systems (EuroSys 2018) [4] Wonderland: A Novel Abstraction-Based Out-Of-Core Gragh Processing System Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Youwei Zhuo, Xuehai Qian, Chenyin Huan, Kang Chen, 23rd Architectural Support for Programming Languages and Operating Systems (ASPLOS 2018) [5] GraphP: Reducing Communication of PIM-based Graph Processing with Efficient Data Partition Mingxing Zhang, Youwei Zhuo, Chao Wang, Mingyu Gao, Yongwei Wu, Kang Chen, Christos Kozyrakis, Xuehai Qian, 24th IEEE International Symposium on High-Performance Computer Architecture (HPCA 2018) [6] Squeezing out All the Value of Loaded Data: An Out-of-core Graph Processing System with Reduced Disk I/O Zhiyuan Ai, Mingxing Zhang, Yongwei Wu, Xuehai Qian, Kang Chen, Weimin Zheng, 2017 USENIX Annual Technical Conference (ATC 2017). [7] RFP: When RPC is Faster than Server-Bypass with RDMA. Maomeng Su, Mingxing Zhang, Kang Chen, ZhenyuGuo, Yongwei Wu, 12th European Conference on Computer Systems Systems (EuroSys 2017).
